title: San Serif Font
content:
Thanks in advance for your help as always!

author: jharrison

comments.content: Part of the square dotted /i, looks very close to [Century Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828212854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/century-gothic) for me. A reworked [Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828212854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura) would work fine too.
